"A.P.241/4/10/12:00": "Hm? Ah, <%me>. The place for the press conference hasn't been decided yet. Can you wait just a little longer?"
"1. Hitsugi must be very important to you."
"2. Weren't you being a little too strict?"
"Well, yeah... She's the only family I have left."
"I know I was tough on her. But if I'm not strict, it won't get through to her."
"Our parents perished during an accident. More accurately, they died during the accident to save me and Hitsugi."
"At the time, it was considered quite a large incident. A great disaster where the entire department store collapsed... The only survivors were me and Hitsugi."

"They were spouting things like 'miracle survivors' and 'parent's love' and such. I saw numerous relatives, who don't even know our faces, start crying and talking on TV. No one likely remembers anymore, though..."
"And, during their final moments, I made a promise to my parents."
"That I would protect her, no matter what..."
"During that incident, I awakened to my abilities. Afterwards, Earth Guide came and scouted me, and I joined up."
"To start anything, you need money. On that note, Earth Guide gives a pretty good pay. Thanks to them, I've had it easy."
"And so, in order to investigate Mother Cluster, I enrolled in that school... Tensei Academy. As a result, Hitsugi followed me there."
"It would have been fine if it was just us attending the same school, but... to think she'd end up joining Mother Cluster... Rest assured, I was terrified the day I found out."
"If only I had just a little more strength, I could have taken her away from Mother Cluster, by force if I had to. Luckily, you happened to come along and it all turned out okay."
"As long as she stays here, she should be safe."
